name: 3D Platformer Final (gerlac32)
description:
Modifications:

1. A Jump Boost Powerup that gives the player more jump power (it is blue in color).

2. A Speed Boost Powerup that increases the player's movement speed (it is yellow in color).

3. An original, fully-playable, coherent level 2 that utilizes both powerups. 

Created by Soren Gerlach
